feed.title: Miklb’s Mindless Ramblings
feed.subtitle: Chronicling life in a digital world. Touching on web dev, food, and a little of everything in between.

entry.content: Consider this my successful unmanned #indieweb note. Automated u-syndication links to static Jekyll notes from brid.gy. Kludgy but working.
entry.summary: Consider this my successful unmanned #indieweb note. Automated u-syndication links to static Jekyll notes from brid.gy. Kludgy but working.

entry.content: tfw you’re not exactly sure which part of the code isn’t working. #hackityhackhack

entry.content: Now to just see why data file isn’t being created. Sorry to anyone who thinks I’m spamming timeline. All in the name of indie publishing!!

entry.content: Hey friends. I’ve turned off the news and am listening to music this morning. Send me some new tunes to listen to.

entry.content: Impressed with v1 of Jekyll Admin, a GUI for writing/editing posts locally. https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll-admin Looking forward to expansion of API
